titleStmt.title: A copy of the verses made by that reverend man of God, Mr. John Wilson, Pastor of the First Church in Boston, on the sudden death of Mr. Joseph Brisco who was translated from earth to heaven Jan. 2, 1657.
titleStmt.author: Wilson, John, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
